...the Tribunal, the Dissidents do not challenge the sainthood or <mark>heroism</mark> of the Tribunal. In fact, the Dissident priests advocate...
..., and cured them of the blight. This is Vivec's <mark>heroism</mark> -- his tender heart provides strength when his might fails....
